data.oai_dc:dc: Focal tree size, competitive environment, regeneration counts within 5m of focal tree, and focal tree 10yr Basal Area Increment (2003-2012) data for 9 species replicates. One .csv per species replicate, named by Transect ID (CO/MT/WA) and Species ID (PIPO = Pinus ponderosa, POTR = Populus tremuloides, ABLA=Abies lasiocarpa, TSHE = Tsuga heterophylla, PSME = Psuedotsuga menziesii). treeinfobai_Metadata_VERSION# .csv has metadata including column descriptions.
Range margins|tree rings|elevation ranges|Stress Tradeoff Hypothesis|range constraint mechanisms|species distributions
